quotes.quote: A man that is ashamed of passions that are natural and reasonable is generally proud of those that are shameful and silly.
It is a shameful thing to be weary of inquiry when what we search for is excellent.
Life is a series of embarrassing moments which leave you feeling alone in your confusion and shame.
Nothing is so embarrassing as watching someone do something that you said couldn't be done.
Embarrassment isn't a just cause of action.
The rate at which a person can mature is directly proportional to the embarrassment he can tolerate.
You can never really trust someone who remembers every embarrassing detail of your adolescence.
It is humiliating to remain with our hands folded while other write history. It matters little who wins.
There is nothing in the world more shameful than establishing one's self on lies and fables.
It was a shameful thing that she had nothing of which to be ashamed.
Embarrassment is a villain to be crushed.
For shameful deeds are taught by shameful deeds.
Have you ever gotten the feeling that you aren't completely embarrassed yet, but you glimpse tomorrow's embarrassment?
Whoever is detected in a shameful fraud is ever after not believed even if they speak the truth.
It is not the criminal things which are hardest to confess, but the ridiculous and shameful.
It was shameful and embarrassing that there were two years in a row without a single actor of color nominated. That's insane.
There is nothing shameful about being efficient.
To an adolescent, there is nothing in the world more embarrassing than a parent.
Most things in life are moments of pleasure and a lifetime of embarrassment; photography is a moment of embarrassment and a lifetime of pleasure.
To a shameful extent, the charm of marriage boils down to how unpleasant it is to be alone.
Nothing is more humiliating than to see idiots succeed in enterprises we have failed in.
Embarrassment isn't a just cause of action.
Things aren't often what they appear to be at first blush. But embarrassment is.
It's discouraging to make a mistake, but it's humiliating when you find out you're so unimportant that nobody noticed it.
Almost all our desires, when examined, contain something too shameful to reveal.
Nothing is as embarrassing as watching your boss do something you assured him couldn't be done.
The first and greatest victory is to conquer yourself; to be conquered by yourself is of all things most shameful and vile.
Do not be embarrassed by your failures, learn from them and start again.
It is more shameful to distrust our friends than to be deceived by them.
It's very embarrassing to be put on the spot.

Shame cannot exist in conditions of light, sunshine, and humor. So the very moment that you share your most shameful moments - and can learn to laugh about them - then the spell is lifted. And you, too, are free.
